summary: eric liu: we are not convinced that their analysis of a limited number of RNA viruses leads to compelling conclusions without a comprehensive study that should include proper statistical tests. liu: we are unaware of a comprehensive analysis of the host-virus combinations from all three domains of life; we believe this would be a worthwhile endeavor. philic bacteria more closely resembles that of thermophilic archaea (17, 19) philic bacteria more closely resembles that of thermophilic archaea than mesophilic bacteria (17, 19).
